Title: Dais Arcanum
Legend: Groundbound Stormcast mages forced to travel swiftly will summon a construct known as a Dais Arcanum. These mystical discs are empowered by the winds of Azyr, bolstering the arcane arts of any who stand upon them.
Intro: Arcane Enhancement: The magical energies of a Dais Arcanum are attuned to those of the wizard who rides upon it.A WIZARD on a Dais Arcanum can attempt to unbind 1 extra spell in the enemy hero phase.

Rules.Name: Winds Of Azyr
Rules.Fluff: The Dais Arcanum glides on arcane currents to evade incoming attacks.
Rules.Rule: Winds of Azyr: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target a WIZARD on a Dais Arcanum.
